text.en_us: I thought you wanted to play the demo game?
text.de_de: I thought you wanted to play the demo game?
text.ja_jp: I thought you wanted to play the demo game?

text.en_us: So, how do I play it?
text.de_de: So, how do I play it?
text.ja_jp: So, how do I play it?

text.en_us: If you are new, you best enter the pause menu with the pause button (on Keyboards 'P') and on touch devices by clicking on yourself and then the settings symbol.
text.de_de: If you are new, you best enter the pause menu with the pause button (on Keyboards 'P') and on touch devices by clicking on yourself and then the settings symbol.
text.ja_jp: If you are new, you best enter the pause menu with the pause button (on Keyboards 'P') and on touch devices by clicking on yourself and then the settings symbol.

text.en_us: In the menu you click Settings -> Controls -> Layout
text.de_de: In the menu you click Settings -> Controls -> Layout
text.ja_jp: In the menu you click Settings -> Controls -> Layout

text.en_us: So there I can figure out the buttons but how do I fight off possible threats?
text.de_de: So there I can figure out the buttons but how do I fight off possible threats?
text.ja_jp: So there I can figure out the buttons but how do I fight off possible threats?

text.en_us: That is quite easy. Climb on trees and search the map at every possible corner for weapons and powerups to your advantage.
